snippet: The sinking floor, not the glass ceiling, is the urgent issue.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Stephanie Coontz, faculty member at The Evergreen State College, contends that men now have a direct stake in policies that advance gender equity, as much of the wage gap between men and women stems from general wage inequality in society at large.
lead_paragraph: The sinking floor, not the glass ceiling, is the urgent issue.
